order.orderPageToastDescription: Enjoy our summer sale with a discount from us. It will be automatically applied on checkout!
order.orderSuccessPageAlertDescription1: Thank you for ordering from Cartoon Gifts! Your order is on its way to us - you will receive a confirmation email with the order details.
order.orderSuccessPageAlertDescription2: If you have problems or want to contact us please email us at :
order.orderFailurePageAlertTitle: It looks like something did not go as planned!
order.orderFailurePageAlertDescription: Your payment might have failed or you have canceled your order - if this is not the case, please contact us!
